greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array T(n,k), n >= 1, k >= 1, read by antidiagonals, where T(n,k) = Sum_{1 <= x_1 <= x_2 <= ... <= x_k <= n} gcd(x_1, x_2, ... , x_k, n).
formula: G.f. of column k: Sum_{j>=1} phi(j) * x^j/(1 - x^j)^(k+1).
mathematica: T[n_, k_] := DivisorSum[n, EulerPhi[n/#] * Binomial[k + # - 1, k] &]; Table[T[k, n - k + 1], {n, 1, 11}, {k, 1, n}] // Flatten (* _Amiram Eldar_, Apr 18 2021 *)
program: (PARI) T(n, k) = sumdiv(n, d, eulerphi(n/d)*binomial(d+k-1, k));
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Apr 17 2021
